nodes.bodyText:
this doesn't seem right to me but I don't know how to make the file appear under the webjars directory vs webapps/library/js during the deploy process.
Do these libraries have to be in webjars.org? I tried adding
<!--Used in Delegated Access, Site Manage -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.webjars</groupId>
            <artifactId>asmselect</artifactId>
            <version>1.0.4a-beta</version>
            <scope>runtime</scope>
        </dependency>
to the POM but that created a build error and I couldn't find asmselect on webjars.org.
Looks like there's a label missing for this input. That makes it hard for people using screen readers or voice control to use the input.
